body:
Thanks. This has been on the list for a long time now ([http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/simulating-...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/simulating-ies-lamps-file-through-rad-materials?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1237035&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987)). There are solutions and Sarith has already developed a number of components for this purpose. I just sent him an email to see if he's still thinking to share the components, otherwise I will implement it at some point soon.

See page 40 of this presentation: [http://www.radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2015-philadelphi...](http://www.radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2015-philadelphia/presentations/day2/RadianceWorkshop_ParametricDaylighting.pdf)
